base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray wardrobe with simple design.
part_description: Two large vertical doors, rectangular shape, covering front. Top, bottom, and side panels form the main structure.
internal_interaction_description: The two doors swing open on hinges attached to the side panels, allowing access to the interior. Shelves or hanging rods may be installed inside, supported by the side and back panels, providing space for organizing items.
external_interaction_description: The wardrobe stands on the floor, providing storage space for clothes and other items. It can be placed against a wall in a bedroom or closet. Doors open outward, requiring space in front for easy access.
